tool_description: Transforms and standardizes product data from supplier formats to catalog-ready format including data cleansing, normalization, and enrichment.

input_data_id.description: Identifier for the input data to transform

transformation_rules.description: List of transformation rules to apply

data_cleansing_level.description: Intensity of data cleansing: basic, standard, aggressive

preserve_original.description: Whether to preserve original data alongside transformed data

enrichment_enabled.description: Enable automatic data enrichment from external sources

error_messages: Invalid input_data_id: Input data identifier must exist and be accessible.
Empty transformation_rules: At least one transformation rule must be specified.
Invalid transformation_rules format: Rules must follow the expected syntax pattern.
Unsupported data_cleansing_level: Use one of [basic, standard, aggressive].
Transformation failed: One or more transformation rules could not be applied successfully.
Data integrity violation: Transformed data violates catalog system constraints.
usage: Specify input_data_id and transformation_rules. Configure data_cleansing_level, preserve_original, and enrichment_enabled as needed. Returns transformed data with quality metrics.

transformation_status.description: Status of transformation process: completed, partial, failed

failed_records.description: Number of records that failed transformation

quality_score.description: Overall data quality score after transformation (0-1)

enrichment_additions.description: Number of data points added through enrichment
